mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id, c.name AS category, p.name AS product_name, p.consumer_price AS price, p.size, p.gender, p.color, p.season, p.fit, p.first_cost, s.stock, ss.quantity FROM product p JOIN category c ON (c.category_id = p.category_id) LEFT JOIN stock s ON (p.product_id = s.product_id) JOIN shop_sales ss ON (ss.product_id = p.product_id) GROUP BY ss.product_id
UPDATE product p JOIN shop_stock s on (p.product_id = s.product_id) SET s.discount = #{discount} WHERE p.product_id = #{product_id}
